properties.name: Mary Carter Greenway Trail
properties.description: The spine of the SSPR trail system, following the South Platte River for 8.5 miles through South Platte Park. Passes Carson Nature Center and the only unchannelized section of the river in metro Denver.

properties.name: Bear Creek Trail
properties.description: Follows Bear Creek from Sheridan west, connecting to the South Platte River via Mary Carter Greenway.

properties.name: High Line Canal Trail
properties.description: Historic 71-mile irrigation canal trail. This 9-mile segment passes through the SSPR district, serving as a critical urban wildlife corridor with mature cottonwood canopy.

properties.name: Lee Gulch Trail
properties.description: Follows Lee Gulch drainage from the South Platte River eastward, a natural wildlife corridor connecting riparian and upland habitats.

properties.name: Willow Creek Trail
properties.description: Follows Willow Creek through Centennial and Lone Tree, connecting numerous parks along its 7-mile length. Important wildlife corridor.

properties.name: Little Dry Creek Trail
properties.description: Follows Little Dry Creek through Centennial, an important tributary corridor with riparian vegetation.

properties.name: Big Dry Creek Trail (North)
properties.description: Northern section of the Big Dry Creek corridor, following the creek through residential areas of Littleton.

properties.name: Columbine Trail
properties.description: Runs through the Columbine area near South Platte Park, connecting neighborhoods to open spaces.

properties.name: Centennial Link Trail
properties.description: Major east-west connector linking Centennial neighborhoods to the broader trail network.

properties.name: Railroad Spur / Mineral Ave Trail
properties.description: Follows a former railroad grade along Mineral Avenue, a flat east-west connector trail.

properties.name: Cook Creek Regional Trail
properties.description: Follows Cook Creek through Lone Tree, connecting Ridgegate area parks and open spaces.

properties.name: Happy Canyon Regional Trail
properties.description: Connects the eastern portion of the district near Lone Tree to regional trail networks.

properties.name: Littleton Community Trail
properties.description: Urban community trail connecting Littleton neighborhoods, parks, and schools.

properties.name: Big Dry Creek Trail (South)
properties.description: Southern section of Big Dry Creek Trail, continuing through Centennial neighborhoods.

properties.name: C-470 Trail
properties.description: Major east-west multi-use trail paralleling C-470 highway through Highlands Ranch and Lone Tree. Passes near the South Suburban Sports Complex and connects to numerous north-south trails.
